BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Remove reset usages and remaining method from SearchShardIterator (#121934) remaining is used in tests only since the recent change to counting in AbstractSearchAsyncAction. reset was used in a couple of places where it does not seem like it's needed anymore.
